official_title: A bill to extend the Developmental Disabilities Services and Facilities Construction Act, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Developmental Disabilities Amendments - Amends the Developmental Disabilities Services and Facilities Construction Act to extend authorizations of appropriations under such Act for (1) basic State allotments; (2) supplementary allotments to States to assist them in meeting funding requirements; (3) university-affiliated demonstration and training programs, including satellite centers; (4) construction and renovation of facilities used in such university-affiliated programs; and (5) special projects. Extends the due dates for certain reports required under such Act and under the Developmentally Disabled Assistance and Bill of Rights Act. Repeals the provision establishing a National Advisory Council on Services and Facilities for the Developmentally Disabled.
